=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 9 hours 30 mins -
19 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 6 hours 20 mins -
12 hours 40 mins || 76 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 4 hours 13 mins 20 secs -
8 hours 26 mins 40 secs || 51 mulch |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
